---
title: PREP_FLOW
---

PREP_FLOW performs initial GWAS preprocessing.

Key responsibilities

- Merge per-chromosome REGENIE files into `{trait}_regenie_allchr.txt` (unless `merged_regenie_files` provided).
- Quality control filtering (MAF, INFO thresholds).
- Liftover between builds (if required) and creation of GENPOS columns.
- RSID mapping using 1000 Genomes reference.

Important parameters

- `merged_regenie_files` - provide merged GWAS to skip per-chromosome merging.
- `skip_prep` - boolean; auto-skip if PREP outputs already exist.

Outputs

- `{trait}_regenie_allchr.txt`
- `{trait}_38_37.txt` and `{trait}_38_37_rsids.txt`
